addon.name: Surveillance Room - Toggle Preview Context Menu Item

extension.summary: A context menu item that works with Surveillance Room - a full featured IP Camera viewer for up to 4 IP Cameras.
extension.description: Easily disable/enable previews from showing from the context menu as required.
extension.disclaimer: This add-on is not affiliated with Foscam. This add-on will modify some settings on the camera itself such as motion and sound detection settings.
